s: Summary: “AI Meets HONGKONG” mixer uniting AI, hardware and crypto builders for deep‑dive keynotes and networking.
Topics: LLM agents, edge robotics, decentralized hardware, regulatory landscape, intelligent IoT.
Speakers: Pioneering startups and hardware‑crypto innovators (unnamed).
r: Gain actionable insights on AI‑hardware‑crypto convergence.
Meet cross‑disciplinary founders shaping next‑gen products.
Identify high‑potential investment opportunities at the hardware‑crypto nexus.
